content: Hey there! I put together a few pieces that I think would look great on you. The floral maxi dress from In Bloom by Jonquil is a showstopper and would be perfect for a summer wedding or special occasion. The striped t-shirt dress from Caslon is a versatile piece that can be dressed up or down, and the slim fit chino pants from BOSS are a great option for a more polished look. The cropped denim jacket from Levi's is a classic piece that will never go out of style, and the plaid button-up shirt dress from Calvin Klein is a fun and trendy option. I hope you like the pieces and have fun mixing and matching to create your own unique looks!
